titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: There was a Chapter meeting in the morning: and a Garden Party in the afternoon; the latter was more or less spoiled by a deluge.
Mr Wedderbrun, the President, & Mr Strauss, the Treasurer of the Oxford Union, arrived.
